name: unburied
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not buried in the ground: unburied bodies/corpses/dead The bodies of the dead were left unburied. As the cables were unburied, they often got damaged and needed to be repaired.
More examplesFewer examplesHealth officials worry the delays could lead to the spread of disease from unburied bodies.An unknown number of civilians may still lie unburied amid the ruins.The animals which had died were left unburied in the fields for days.His unburied remains are still awaiting return to his home country.No seedlings had emerged from the unburied pods.
